tasks.label: Create ballet gallery page
tasks.command: cp index.html index.html.bak && sed -i '' 's/font-family: Arial, sans-serif/font-family: "Times New Roman", Times, serif/' index.html

tasks.label: Update gallery images
tasks.command: sed -i '' 's/跳舞1.svg/跳舞-1.JPG/g; s/跳舞\([2-9]\).svg/跳舞\1.JPG/g; s/跳舞-芭蕾.svg/跳舞-芭蕾.JPG/g; s/跳舞小时候.svg/跳舞小时候.JPG/g' index.html
